Assistant: Great! I found *<https://app.attio.com/textql-data/person/612c58ce-fd84-4dfc-8001-468da8257fab/overview|Ryan Craig>* already exists in the CRM. He's already created as a person with the email <mailto:ryan_craig@cable.comcast.com|ryan_craig@cable.comcast.com>.

Since Ryan Craig is already in the system, you don't need to create him. If you'd like to update any information about him or add notes, I can help with that. What would you like to do with Ryan Craig's record?

User: nope i want you to create one for ryan craig from luemris, searhc him up

Assistant: I understand you want to create a new Ryan Craig from Lumeris. Let me search for information about Ryan Craig at Lumeris to help gather details for creating his record.
Perfect! I found detailed information about Ryan Craig from Lumeris. 
Ryan currently serves as the Vice President of Analytics at Lumeris since December 2022.
 Let me also search for his contact information to create a complete record.
I understand you want to create a new Ryan Craig record for the one from Lumeris. However, I need to clarify that I can only search and manage existing records in your CRM - I don't have the ability to create new person, company, or deal records. The CRM tools available to me are focused on searching, updating, and adding notes to existing entities.

Based on my research, here's what I found about Ryan Craig from Lumeris:

*Ryan Craig Profile Information:*
- *Name*: 
Ryan Craig, MMCi (Master of Management in Clinical Informatics)
- *Current Position*: Vice President of Analytics at Lumeris since December 2022

- *Company*: 
Lumeris - helps health systems, providers and payers deliver value-based care and improve outcomes through population health management

- *Location*: 
Maryland Heights, Missouri


*Background*:
- 
Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) in Organizational Behavior Studies from Southern Methodist University (1993-1997)

- 
Master's degree in Master of Management in Clinical Informatics (MMCi) from Duke University (2018-2019)

- 
Previously worked at Duke University Health System in multiple roles including Senior Director of Enterprise Analytics, Director of Data Engineering, and Senior Manager of Enterprise Data Warehouse

- 
Before Duke, worked at WakeMed as Manager of Information Delivery


*Certifications*: 
Radar Administrator, Reporting Workbench Administrator, Reporting Coordinator, and Certified Business Intelligence Professional


To create a new person record in your CRM, you would need to:
1. Log into your Attio CRM directly at <http://app.attio.com|app.attio.com>
2. Navigate to the People section
3. Click "Add Person" and enter the details I've found

Would you like me to help you with anything else regarding the existing Ryan Craig record or search for other information about Lumeris?
